text: Hii errichto! Please don't stop making these videos. They are really good and helps a beginner to see the thought process while solving a problem. Thank you 🤗
Can you make a tutorial completely based on competitive programming in udemy so that you get paid too for doing that.
Can you please try this problem https://www.codechef.com/DEC17/problems/CHEFFIB
thanks so much, and can you do more tutorials about codeforces problems?  such as div2, B、C、D,  the video lenght don't need too long.
thanks very much for the subtitle， and Never stop making such tutorials. They are very helpful
Nice explanation, I actually understood most of it!
Thank you brother for doing this .

Thanks for the clear explanation. When you solved the problem for the first time, did you make the unusual observation before thinking about prefix sum? I mean, did you make the observation to optimize solution with prefix sum, or did you first make the observation and managed to use it later?

thanks for video..
can you please tell me setup of c++ in window?
because when i compile with (in geany window version)

g++ -std=c++17 -Wshadow -Wall -o %e %f -fsanitize=address -fsanitize=undefined -D_GLIBCXX_DEBUG -g
above command i get error that lubsan is not present.
Thank you very much for explaining a tough problem!!!
